mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ST.APO_CD , ST.APO_SE , ST.YR , ST.CTGRY_CD , ST.ITEM_CD , (SELECT ITEM_NM FROM TB_GPC_CD WHERE ITEM_CD = ST.ITEM_CD) AS ITEM_NM , ST.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN , ST.PRDCR_OGNZ_CD , ST.FLNM , (CASE WHEN TOT.SLS_CNSGN_PRCHS_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN TOT.SLS_CNSGN_PRCHS_AMT ELSE ST.SPMT_PRC END) AS SLS_CNSGN_PRCHS_AMT , TOT.UO_SPMT_AMT , TOT.UO_OTHER_SPMT_AMT , TOT.RMRK FROM TB_EV_FRMHS_PRDCTN_EC_SPMT_STTN ST LEFT JOIN TB_EV_UO_ISO_PRCHS_PRCHS_SLS_TOT TOT ON ST.APO_CD = TOT.APO_CD AND ST.APO_SE = TOT.APO_SE AND ST.YR = TOT.YR AND ST.CTGRY_CD = TOT.CTGRY_CD AND ST.ITEM_CD = TOT.ITEM_CD AND ST.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN = TOT.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT ITEM.APO_CD , ITEM.APO_SE , ITEM.YR , TOT.CTGRY_CD , ITEM.ITEM_CD , (SELECT ITEM_NM FROM TB_GPC_CD WHERE ITEM_CD = ITEM.ITEM_CD) AS ITEM_NM , TOT.PRDCR_OGNZ_SN , '99' AS PRDCR_OGNZ_CD , '농가 법인 등' AS FLNM , '' AS SLS_CNSGN_PRCHS_AMT , TOT.UO_SPMT_AMT , TOT.UO_OTHER_SPMT_AMT , TOT.RMRK FROM (SELECT ITEM_CD , APO_CD , APO_SE , YR FROM TB_EV_FRMHS_PRDCTN_EC_SPMT_STTN WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ITEM_CD , APO_CD , APO_SE , YR ) ITEM LEFT JOIN TB_EV_UO_ISO_PRCHS_PRCHS_SLS_TOT TOT ON ITEM.ITEM_CD = TOT.ITEM_CD AND ITEM.APO_CD = TOT.APO_CD AND TOT.PRDCR_OGNZ_CD = '99' ) ORDER BY ITEM_CD , PRDCR_OGNZ_CD , FLNM

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.pd.isom.mapper.InvShipOgnSpeczItmPurSalMngMapper.selectInvShipOgnSpeczItmPurSalMngList */ CM.TEST_NO , CM.AA , CM.BB , CM.CC , CM.CC_CODE , CM.DD , CM.DD_CODE , CM.EE , CM.FF , CM.GG , CM.HH , CM.II , CM.II_CODE , CM.JJ , CM.KK , CM.LL , CM.MM , CM.NN , CM.OO , CM.PP , CM.QQ , CM.RR , CM.SS , CM.TT , CM.UU , CM.VV , CM.WW , CM.XX , CM.YY , CM.ZZ , CM.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID) AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID_NM , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID) AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID_NM , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_PD_PrdcrCrclOgnVluIdctrMng CM WHERE 1=1
AND CM.CC_CODE LIKE #{ccCode} || '%'
AND CM.II_CODE LIKE '%' || #{iiCode} || '%'
AND CM.TEST_NO LIKE '%' || #{testNo} || '%'
